events.text: i think there should be pre-determined dots or segments that get colored in

ones with ends need starting points (the ends)
for ones without ends, you can start anywhere
once you start, you need to keep moving the same direction

if having that many points is a problem, have every nth point be the waypoint, and don't color any points past it until it's touched
or just touch the dot on each side
adjust the size of TouchFollower to be smaller if they're using a mouse
i can do JS in here... maybe i should use the code of my codepen to calculate the points
